name: magica-canvas
description: canvas and ImageMagick operations to see how fast it can be

scripts.build-prepare: npm run clean && P=$PWD && cd ../../ && npm run build && cd $P && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run build-prepare && npx parcel serve src/index.html -d docs
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && npm run copy
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prepare && npx parcel build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --no-source-maps --public-url './' && rm -rf ../../../demos/docs/magica/canvas && mkdir -p ../../../demos/docs/magica/canvas &&  mv docs/* ../../../demos/docs/magica/canvas
scripts.build-prod-q8-no-hdri: npm run build-prepare && npx parcel build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --no-source-maps --public-url './' && rm -rf ../../../demos/docs/magica/canvas-q8-no-hdri && mkdir -p ../../../demos/docs/magica/canvas-q8-no-hdri &&  mv docs/* ../../../demos/docs/magica/canvas-q8-no-hdri
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build-prod

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
